body_html: @ahaider3 Looks like you are building with C++ bindings, if you don't need those you can set this environment variable OMPI_SKIP_MPICXX=1. If you do need them you have to modify the TensorFlow configure file to add the mpicxx.h file.
body_text: @ahaider3 Looks like you are building with C++ bindings, if you don't need those you can set this environment variable OMPI_SKIP_MPICXX=1. If you do need them you have to modify the TensorFlow configure file to add the mpicxx.h file.
body: @ahaider3 Looks like you are building with C++ bindings, if you don't need those you can set this environment variable `OMPI_SKIP_MPICXX=1`. If you do need them you have to modify the TensorFlow configure file to add the mpicxx.h file.
